subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text: Same word as {{och-l|運|to revolve; to move}} ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}). See there for more.

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# {{lb|zh|astronomy}} [[halo]] (around the [[Sun]] or the [[Moon]])
# a [[ring]] of [[light]] or [[colour]], or a [[blurred]] [[area]] surrounding a [[luminous]] or [[coloured]] [[object]]; [[halo]] around a [[light]] or [[colour]]
# [[blush]]; slight [[redness]]
# {{†}} [[ring]]-shaped [[pattern]]
# {{†}} [[bull's eye]]
# to [[spread]]; to [[proliferate]]; to [[seep]] through
# {{†}} to [[apply]] (colour, especially [[makeup]])

subSections.text: {{zh-der|山暈|微暈|光暈|暈珥|月暈效應|日暈|眼暈|環暈|月暈而風|月暈|紅暈|墨暈|酒暈|血暈}}

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to make one [[feel]] [[dizzy]]; to [[feel]] the [[head]] [[spin]]ning; to have [[vertigo]]
